definition: "fire" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 86), occurring in 熙, 然, 熊 etc
Kangxi, title of the reign (1661-1722) of the Kangxi Emperor 聖祖|圣祖[Sheng4 zu3]
Bo Xilai (1949-), PRC politician, appointed to the Politburo in 2007, sentenced in 2013 to life imprisonment for corruption and misconduct
Park Chung-Hee (1917-1979), South Korean military man and dictator, president 1963-1979, influential in developing Korean industry, murdered by his bodyguard
Barbie Hsu (1976-), Taiwanese entertainer, nicknamed 大S
Liu Xi (late Han, c. 200 AD), possibly the author of 釋名|释名[Shi4 ming2]
Hongxi Emperor, reign name of fourth Ming emperor Zhu Gaochi 朱高熾|朱高炽[Zhu1 Gao1 chi4] (1378-1425), reigned (1424-1425), Temple name 明仁宗[Ming2 Ren2 zong1]
the Kangxi Dictionary, named after the Kangxi Emperor, who in 1710 ordered its compilation, containing 47,035 single-character entries
variant of 熙熙攘攘[xi1 xi1 rang3 rang3]

sentences.english: To wipe out Xixia , the Song government engaged in Xihelu carefully.
sentences.chinese: 宋政府悉心经营熙河路，目的是为灭亡西夏打基础。

sentences.english: They can hear in the nosie, see in the dark.
sentences.chinese: 他们可以听到熙攮，看到在黑暗中。

sentences.english: In the mid 20th century the Trappists increased in membership, particularly in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 在20世纪中叶的熙笃增加成员，特别是在美国。

sentences.english: Li Junxi let the manufacturer to prosecute Jiang Minhao, said the company infringement.
sentences.chinese: 李俊熙让这些厂家起诉姜敏浩，说公司侵权。

sentences.english: Hello everybody, my name is Kim Jeong-Hee, and we hope to be good friends.
sentences.chinese: 大家好，我叫金祯熙，希望能和大家做好朋友。

sentences.chinese: 三顺得知熙真生病的音讯后来熙真家探病。
